mapper.update: /* 상품 수정 */ UPDATE goods SET gds_nm = #{gdsNm}, gds_amt = #{gdsAmt}, gds_type = #{gdsType}, gds_period_quantity = #{gdsPeriodQuantity}, gds_unit = #{gdsUnit}, gds_status = #{gdsStatus}, gds_mdfcn_adm_cd = #{gdsMdfcnAdmCd}, gds_mdfcn_ymdt = #{gdsMdfcnYmdt} WHERE gds_cd = #{gdsCd}
mapper.select: /* 상품 코드로 조회 */ SELECT gds_cd AS gdsCd, gds_nm AS gdsNm, gds_amt AS gdsAmt, gds_type AS gdsType, gds_period_quantity AS gdsPeriodQuantity, gds_unit AS gdsUnit, gds_reg_adm_cd AS gdsRegAdmCd, gds_reg_ymdt AS gdsRegYmdt, gds_mdfcn_adm_cd AS gdsMdfcnAdmCd, gds_mdfcn_ymdt AS gdsMdfcnYmdt, gds_status AS gdsStatus, gds_target_member_type AS gdsTargetMemberType FROM goods WHERE gds_cd = #{gdsCd}
